file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  title: "Primary API Gateway"
paths:
  /admin/reports:
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Empty"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        httpMethod: "GET"
        uri: {"Fn::Sub": "https://${ReportingApi}.execute-api.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com/Prod"}
        responses:
          default:
            statusCode: "200"
        requestParameters:
          integration.request.header.x-api-key: {"Fn::Sub":["'${APIHeader}'",{"APIHeader": { "Ref": "ApiKeyValue"}}]}
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        type: "http_proxy"
  /admin/users:
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Empty"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        httpMethod: "GET"
        uri: {"Fn::Sub": "https://${UserManagementApi}.execute-api.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com/Prod"}
        responses:
          default:
            statusCode: "200"
        requestParameters:
          integration.request.header.x-api-key: {"Fn::Sub":["'${APIHeader}'",{"APIHeader": { "Ref": "ApiKeyValue"}}]}
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        type: "http_proxy"
components:
  schemas:
    Empty:
      title: "Empty Schema"
      type: "object"
